Hong Kongers have been protesting for freedoms and democracy peacefully for 22 years, and what do we get?

Nothing! On the contrary, CCP violently suppress our freedom of press, speech, religion in many different ways to control Hong Kong. There is not much left of our freedom if we don’t fight back against this evilest of totalitarian regimes.

It’s true that some scenes during the protests in Hong Kong have not been fully peaceful recently. People who are convicted of rioting may sentence to jail for 10 years.

No one would choose to use violence if peaceful protests work. That is why there are still so many Hong Kongers risking their lives, protesting on the streets every week.

We know that Liberty and Democracy are not something nations are born with. Ancestors sacrificed their lives and blood, and often failed.
As Thomas Jefferson, one of the Founding Fathers of the US said, "The tree of liberty must be refreshed from time to time with the blood of patriots and tyrants."

We are willing to pay the price of having a free, open and moral society.
Please support Hong Kong, we need everyone’s help!
